content: Trumpy is having his trusted biological sons run his precious businesses cause he cares about his businesses, and money, and greed. He doesn’t care how much Mr. Zero-Experience Kushner messes up the country cause Trump does not give a shit about the country. This whole Presidency is a big old ego trip for his orange ass. Just like he put zero-experience Devos in charge of education and anti-environment what’s-his-face in charge of the environment. It’s all a power trippy game.
